title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with musket and sword]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with musket and sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-56. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
